summary.span: 控制访问加密数据和内存的权限。

span.span: Controls the ability to access encrypted data and memory.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此权限用于控制使用和类来加密数据和内存的能力 。This permission is used to control the ability to encrypt data and memory using the and classes.

summary.span: 创建并返回当前权限的相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本表示对资源的相同访问权限。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 此代码示例旨在显示方法的行为，而不是演示方法的用法。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 通常，权限类的方法由安全基础结构使用;它们通常不在应用程序中使用。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要与当前权限相交的权限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示当前权限和指定权限的交集的一个新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限为 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述它们共同描述的一组操作的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有同时通过这两个权限的需求才能传递交集。Only a demand that passes both individual permissions will pass the intersection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CPP/dataprotect.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/CS/dataprotect.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.DataProtectionPermission2/VB/dataprotect.vb#10)]

span.span: is not and does not specify a permission of the same type as the current permission.

Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission to test for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前权限是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前权限是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前权限指定的一组操作完全包含在指定权限中，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained in the specified permission. 例如， 访问权限是访问权限的一个子集 。For example, a permission for access is a subset of a permission for access. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 此代码示例旨在显示方法的行为，而不是演示方法的用法。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 通常，权限类的方法由安全基础结构使用;它们通常不在应用程序中使用。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前权限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对受权限保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前权限与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 表示同时兼具当前权限和指定权限的新权限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的结果 是一个权限，它表示当前权限和指定权限所表示的所有操作。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 任何传递任意权限的需求都将传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 此代码示例旨在显示方法的行为，而不是演示方法的用法。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 通常，权限类的方法由安全基础结构使用;它们通常不在应用程序中使用。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
